sense.def:
Action
je določeno ravnanje s posebnim namenom.

seg.quote: The government was already taking action.

sense.def:
An action
je nekaj, kar počnemo ob določeni priložnosti.

seg.quote: Surely resigning was rather a rash action?

sense.def:
The action
se nanaša na vse pomembne in razburljive dogodke v določenih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: They want to be where the action is.
The whole action of the book takes place in one day.

sense.def:
Action
je tudi bojevanje v vojni.

seg.quote: Henry had been killed in action.

sense.def:
To put an idea or policy into action
pomeni začeti uporabljati neko zamisel ali politiko.

Če je stroj
out of action
ne dela.
